Subjects: songs, spiritual; Christ, songs in honour of
_description: A song of Jesus — twenty-two lines each beginning with ‘Ihesu’ in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Ihesu god is becomen manIhesu mi love & my
                    lemman…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Ihesu to wonen with þe in blisseIhesu þer offe
                    þat we ne misse Amen
NLS18721.Editions:
Woolf,  Rosemary. 
             The English Religious Lyric in the Middle Ages.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1968: 178.
